name: FiveSeven Studios
overview:
FiveSeven Studios is a small branding and marketing agency founded by Jason VanLue, dedicated to building brands through crafting memorable brand experiences. At FiveSeven we help small to medium sized organizations practically apply niche-specific brand strategy to create opportunities for growth in the marketplace.

As a small, close-knit branding and marketing agency, we are dedicated to helping small and medium sized organizations distill high-level brand practices into practical, relevant, and effective branding solutions that actually make a difference. Effective brand design and development is not just for large organizations, and through our proven Brand-Aid process, we apply the best practices of global brand leaders to a localized niche model. Whether you are a small business, church, non-profit, or professional organization, weâ€™ll help position your brand for success and growth.

Our clients are our highest priority. We believe that effective marketing and branding solutions are those that are functionally applied to the individual client â€“ so rest assured that we wonâ€™t suggest anything that you donâ€™t need, and will seek to provide the best quality service for what you do need. We believe a successful relationship is built on communication and connection. This is achieved through clear, upfront, and meaningful dialogue from the very beginning, in addition to a foundational understanding of your goals, vision, and plan for growth. We want to get to know you intimately, because from this, we can then offer creative solutions that are optimal for your individual situation.

Since 2004 FiveSeven has maintained a reputation for unparalleled service, uncompromising quality, strong client relationships, and expert knowledge. As a small branding and marketing agency, we understand the challenges of building a business or organization in todayâ€™s world. We would love the opportunity to show you why numerous clients from the Fortune 100 to local start-ups trust their creative strategy to us. FiveSeven Studios is privately held and located in Maitland, a suburb of Orlando in beautiful Central Florida.

FiveSeven has had the opportunity to work with senior executives and top creatives at some of the worldâ€™s most recognized companies including NBC-Universal, Fox News, and Yum! Brands. Our work has been recognized by some of the industryâ€™s leading authorities and has been listed on several leading gallery and award websites.
